entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
